summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas will hold a Special Called Joint Meeting of the Council Ad Hoc Committee on Professional Sports Recruitment and Retention and the Council Economic Development Committee on March 26, 2024, at 3:30 PM. The meeting aims to discuss economic development strategies, particularly in relation to attracting and retaining professional sports organizations in Dallas.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. **FIFA World Cup 2026 Update**: A briefing will be provided by Rosa Fleming (Director, Convention & Event Services), Craig Davis (President & CEO, Visit Dallas), and Monica Paul (Executive Director, Visit Dallas - Dallas Sports Commission).
2. **Closed Session Discussion**: The committee will deliberate on commercial and financial information related to a business prospect, referred to as “Project X,” which the city is negotiating with for potential location or expansion.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a closed session to discuss sensitive information regarding financial incentives and real property negotiations that could impact the city's position in dealings with the business prospect. The session will adhere to Texas Government Code provisions regarding confidentiality.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks to approve or provide guidance on the financial incentives related to “Project X” and to finalize strategies for leveraging the FIFA World Cup 2026 to enhance Dallas's economic development efforts. Public attendance is encouraged, both virtually and in person, with live broadcasting available.
